hf.name: Doppelgänger
hf.essence: Exact copy of Alex, cunning and manipulative

tr.name: Dr. Eliza Stern
tr.clothing: White lab coat over business attire

xc.name: Detective Sarah Chen
xc.appearance: Athletic build, long black hair tied back

json_to_edit.voice_over: In a world where your reflection becomes your enemy, who can you trust?
json_to_edit.description: Alex confronts his Doppelgänger and creator in a tense laboratory showdown.
json_to_edit.lighting: Harsh fluorescent lights with occasional flashes
json_to_edit.weather: Stormy outside, visible through large windows
json_to_edit.name: Confrontation of Identities
json_to_edit.scene_summary: Alex faces off against his Doppelgänger and Dr. Stern, while Detective Chen investigates the bizarre case.

qa.action: A sleek, modern laboratory building illuminated by lightning.

hf.action: Alex bursts into the main lab, facing his Doppelgänger and Dr. Stern.

tr.action: Alex and his Doppelgänger circle each other, identical in every way.

xc.action: Dr. Stern's eyes dart between Alex and the Doppelgänger, a mix of pride and concern.

ka.action: Detective Chen observes the confrontation from a security monitor room.

fn.action: Alex and the Doppelgänger grapple, knocking over lab equipment.

af.action: A damaged machine sparks dangerously, threatening to explode.

qo.action: Detective Chen rushes into the lab as chaos unfolds.

fp.action: The eyes of Alex and his Doppelgänger, indistinguishable and filled with fear and determination.

edit_command: Change shot 7 to show Dr. Stern attempting to shut down the malfunctioning machine, with sparks flying around her.

af.sfx_keywords: crackling electricity, frantic typing, alarm beeps
af.action: Dr. Stern frantically attempts to shut down the malfunctioning machine, sparks flying dangerously around her.

qo.action: Detective Chen rushes into the lab as chaos unfolds.

fp.action: The eyes of Alex and his Doppelgänger, indistinguishable and filled with fear and determination.

label.rationale: we will update the 7th shot (key "af") in the scene to show dr. stern attempting to shut down the malfunctioning machine, with sparks flying around her. this change adds more tension and action to the scene, while also giving dr. stern a more active role in the unfolding events. the update will involve modifying the "action" description of the shot and adjusting the "sfx_keywords" to better reflect the new action. we'll keep the shot type as "close-up" since it works well for this intense moment.
